Member Data Documentation

template<typename T>
int* Matrix< T >::iterator::coords
private

The coords array is only used when the matrix is not congiuous or it is in col_major order, otherwise it is NULL

Referenced by Matrix< T >::col_major_iterator::col_major_iterator(), Matrix< T >::iterator::iterator(), and Matrix< T >::iterator::operator=().
